analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0x1db10d198c2d66a8767e7adde7fa5e5bf2d57604.sol:
	Contract GenbbyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x1db10d198c2d66a8767e7adde7fa5e5bf2d57604.sol#570-571)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0x1db10d198c2d66a8767e7adde7fa5e5bf2d57604.sol:
	Contract CrowdsalePhase1 has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x1db10d198c2d66a8767e7adde7fa5e5bf2d57604.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- token.mint(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/39/0x1db10d198c2d66a8767e7adde7fa5e5bf2d57604.sol)
